page.vision_description_s: Is your business facing the following difficulties when Digital Transformation?
page.team_title_s: Digital Transformation Consulting Team at DTSVN
page.team_description_s: With a team of experts with more than 10 years of experience in the field of Digital Transformation and using advanced approaches, DTSVN is committed to accompanying businesses on the Digital Transformation journey, helping to optimize operations and improve business efficiency.

item.value: Tại sao bạn nên chọn DTSVN để triển khai?-en

item.description_html:
For businesses that are just starting out and want to transform digitally
✔️Assess digital readiness and maturity
✔️Assess digital culture
✔️Build priority lists, digital initiatives
✔️Build digital transformation strategies and roadmaps

For businesses that want to optimize digital transformation infrastructure
✔️Evaluate and propose optimization of IT infrastructure
✔️Transform business models towards digital orientation
✔️Optimize operations for businesses
✔️Build customer strategies in the digital environment

For businesses that want to develop comprehensive digital transformation
Talk directly 1:1 so we can understand your business's digital transformation needs

item.description_s: Many unnamed jobs, manual jobs create personnel in the business that take time to solve, not focusing on important jobs.
The most unsynchronized process between prohibitions, prohibited equipment in the work room makes the business's operational efficiency slow down.
Manual data management in the traditional and ununified way leads to lack of transparency and slow progress in work to make timely decisions for the business.
Customers lose their livestock and no longer return to the business because there is no regular and continuous customer care method.

item.position_s: Liverpool John Moores University – United KingdomChief Consultant at DTSVN
Ph.D. in Mathematical Foundations for Informatics – Hanoi University of Science and TechnologyChief Technology Officer at DTSVN
